name: data-dag
description: directed acylic graph with row or column data fields
author: Hugo Villeneuve

scripts.test: npm run build:main & npm run build:sort &cotest ./tst
scripts.build:browser: rollup -o ./browser.js -f iife -n data-dag --banner "/* hugov@runbox.com | https://github.com/hville/data-dag.git | license:MIT */" ./module.js
scripts.build: npm run build:main & npm run build:browser
